ygData.subject: RE: Smithing Info Request
ygData.msgSnippet: It gets you...nothing!  Can only sharpen to tarnished.  Strange huh? Bonzz
ygData.messageBody:
It gets you...nothing! Can only sharpen to tarnished. Strange huh?
Bonzz

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Beth [mailto:jaguar@...]
>Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 11:57 AM
>To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] Smithing Info Request
>
>From: Beth <jaguar@...>
>
>This would be most appreciated.
>
>The weird little question I have is:
>
>sharpening stone and rusty weapon and forger get you tarnished weapon.
>
>tarnished weapon and what get you a regular weapon??
>
>B
>
>> From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>
>>
